Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the town of Highlands to impose a hotel and motel tax
Summary: Authorizes the town of Highlands, Orange county, to impose a hotel and motel tax of up to five percent.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the town of Highlands to impose a hotel and motel tax; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
